website_summaries.verdict: Best option if you want some premium perks without shelling out big bucks – if you don't mind a large side control panel, that is.
pros: Includes a whopping 5 nozzle positions, 3 temperatures, and 5 water pressure levels
Lid closes softly to make nighttime bathroom trips nearly noiseless
Well-liked for its eco-friendly features, including a skin sensor and energy-saving mode
cons: Some consumers complain that the power plug is too short, saying they had to buy an extension cord

customer_reviews.title: Seat finish will not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: The finish has started to come off after only 5 months. I heeded all of their guidelines for cleaning. No harsh chemicals. Nothing abrasive. Just soap and water. Cheap toilet seats can maintain their finishes for years. Even with harsh chemicals! This is some substandard plastic junk and I would avoid it for a $300 toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: That Dude

customer_reviews.title: AN EXCELLENT COMPROMISE.
customer_reviews.text: This is not as good as a dedicated bidet not a bidet/toilet combination unit. BUT it is a good compromise between nothing and having to rip out an existing toilet. You simply remove your existing seat and lid then bolt this on. You then connect it to the water supply with a 'T' connector and hose (both included), then plug it in. It will give you 20-40 seconds of warm wash water then hot air to dry. It can even be put on an RV toilet as it is independent of the flush system.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Rapid City

customer_reviews.title: Clean Anus.
customer_reviews.text: Super clean! I feel like toilet paper is for the little people now.
customer_reviews.author: Blorichon

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if it came with the right adaptor
customer_reviews.text: It requires 3/8" plumbing in your house which is not common here in Calif. Had to go to 3 hardware stores and Home Depot hoping to find the right converter to no avail. Big waste of time. It would be nice if it came with the right adaptor. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: This is my second unit. I'm purchasing this because I know it's going to help me during recovery from hip surgery
customer_reviews.text: 2nd unit purchased. The first one is been installed in our house for almost 2 years and runs perfectly. This product is incredible! In fact... at this price point I don't know why every household does not own at least one of them. I'm installing this second unit because I'm having two hips replaced within eight weeks starting now and no it will make my life infinitely easier during recovery. I have been very impressed with the bidet toilets you find just about everywhere in the pacific rim so I bought one of these about a year ago. It's a fantastic product. Once installed your toilet performs as well as any of $1,200 to $ 2,500 bidet toilets out there.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B.

customer_reviews.title: It does its intended job very well. Needs a ...
customer_reviews.text: It does its intended job very well. Needs a longer cord and the controls are hard to see because of position.
customer_reviews.author: Harold K Ross

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with the product
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after 3 months. Very disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Beware extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried to call amazon customer service and have not been lucky trying to reach them. I am writing this review so others are aware. While researching bidets I decided to pay more to have the water feature be warm. So I could have paid $30 but I decided I wanted these extra features. I was wrong the water comes out completely cold despite being hooked to the hot water line. Extremely disappointed. We payed to get our unit installed and now we are out of our money both ways 😭
customer_reviews.author: Alexia

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective bidet
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. Own the product for more than six months. No leaks and every function is working as if new. We clean it once a week with mild detergent mixed with water, no discoloration. One important note, if power is interrupted, all settings revert back to factory, sit warmer function would turn off.
customer_reviews.author: TV Guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and excellent service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bidet and after installing it, realized that it was not working properly. Called the company and they gave me excellent service. Within a few days, I had the replacement parts with instructions of how to replace them. I now have a product that is working exactly as advertised within a short time of receiving it. I am a very happy customer as too often service is not as prompt as this company gave me.
customer_reviews.author: Katartist

customer_reviews.title: Works great. We love this bidet
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We love this bidet! We also have a different brand bidet (toto) in our second bathroom and we like this one better. Installation is pretty easy, of course you have to add an electric outlet near the toilet, just run a line from the GFCI that is probably right next to the sink down to the toilet area. We ran one under the sink... Great customer service, we had a problem with it after a year and a half, the water level metering device died, the company Hitron Solutions is sending a replacement no charge!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel E.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: We have had this seat for almost 3 years. The finish started coming off of the seat in less than a year. I never used any harsh chemicals- I think maybe just keeping it heated caused it? Looks like a ton of grey little cracks all over- I would never want guests seeing it. The unit itself worked well until recently and we have not had issues with the electronics on it. Unfortunately it started leaking last week so we are on the search for a new seat. If it weren’t for the discoloration I would probably repurchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Dr D

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and some of the best instructions I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I really miss this seat when I travel. Easy installation and some of the best instructions I have had from any product. I love that all the parts I needed were included with the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hygine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these and they were excellent. I wish they had some way to increase/decrease the pressure of the water. They were simple to install . I had one done professionally and found it tool just 10min to install and they just plugged in . I felt professional install was way too expensive given that it just took 10 min and they did not install any wall switch , so its nit worth taking the installation service. I did the other one myself and it was very simple. I highly recommend this specially if you have kids or elders in home.
customer_reviews.author: Rahul Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and still very happy
customer_reviews.text: So it's my first bidet which means I have nothing to compare it with. I've been using it for a while now and haven't had any issues. It was easy to install and is easy to clean. I'm assuming the ones that cost 2, 3 and 4 times as much are better in some ways but for me I'm very happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: An item I did not know I was unwilling to live without
customer_reviews.text: After a long trip to Japan, where bidet's are most everywhere, including most public toilets, I found I did not want to go without a bidet. I ordered this from Japan, so that it would arrive when I returned home. It installed quickly, and provides everything I experienced while traveling. The Dryer is not as good as some of the many thousand dollar commercial toilets I used, but I'm very pleased I went with this unit. The eco mode is great, not leaving the seat and water too warm while not in use. We leave the water heater off, and turn it on when we use the bidet, and it provides sufficient warm water.
customer_reviews.author: Express

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: I likely received a defective product, but it stopped working after the first day. Pressing the buttons on the remote has a 1:1,000 chance of making anything actually happen. In the past two days I've gotten the wand to work once, and the dryer to work not at all. Total waste of money. I would not recommend this product to anyone. I've reached out to their support team, so hopefully we can come to some kind of resolution.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Dang good device.  Great Value and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Home residents - Wife & Husband only - really like it. It is VERY reasonable priced. Like the soft close lid and seat. Really like variety of settings. Small don't likes: 1) Control panel a bit too far back requiring an odd body twist whilst on the seat to adjust. 2) Blower works but I need "hurricane power" blower bec I am a really impatient person. It works and it delivery a warmish stream of air. Also fan needs to be placed closer to the target area or made more powerful. BTW, visiting fam, fnds and custs of my in-home business are afraid to use it BUT they are all really impressed with this gizmo! Always gets a favorable remark.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Two Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Going to Asia will spoil you, so buy one for you!
customer_reviews.text: If you ever traveled to Asia, you most likely have ran into one of these. For the price sold, it's worth every penny. The first one I got was defective, but customer service made it easy to get a replacement, which has worked great ever since. Wintertime will make you appreciate the heated seat, as well as the water.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Not a reliable product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this SB-2000 smartbidet one and half years ago, two month ago the seat started leaking, i tried different way to see what's cause. finally i contacted the manufacturer service office and i was told the body part ( whole engine) is bad, need to be replaced. it's just over the warranty period, so it cost me $100 for the part. it's only little over one year usage, the body part is broken, very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remote is ridiculous. Shouldn't be attached. Bad design for a good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the wrong bidet for me. The attached remote is ridiculous to see. Very difficult to use. Hate the buttons especially the tiny ones to move the spray. Terrible design. How am I supposed to contort myself to see and use this remote. Waste of money. My husband took so long to put it in I cant even return it. Never again. I loved my remote smart bidet with detached remote but my toilet was so small and smart bidet seat was so big that the seat began to crack. You really should tell people that the seat is this large.
customer_reviews.author: Lorilane

customer_reviews.title: You will always be shower clean using this and save money and trees!
customer_reviews.text: I love the adjustability of the water temperature, water flow, the heated seat and the fan to dry off. I also love the remote control as I needed help because I had a torn rotor cuff and tendon in my right shoulder, this made using toilet paper impossible to use as I am right handed. Never using my left hand made it nearly impossible so this was my only help. It thoroughly cleanses and drys like you just had a shower. Much better than toilet paper and will save that expense over time!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: One of them still works well - just like the ones we had in East Asia
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these about a year ago. One of them still works well - just like the ones we had in East Asia. Unfortunately, the other one stopped working about a month after I bought it. I called for a replacement, and was able to get in touch with someone. They promised to ship a replacement. Unfortunately, that replacement never came, and I was never able to get in touch with anybody again. My rating is because: One worked well, but when one doesn't work well, there seems to be a lack in ability to remediate.
customer_reviews.author: slh

customer_reviews.title: this is a life changer
customer_reviews.text: we bought this four years ago and have used it daily since then. it still works great and the heated seat is wonderful on cold, winter nights. I think this may be my favorite thing I ever purchased on Amazon. If and when it breaks, we will immediately order another, We don't ever want to be without a bidet again. we highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: william whitaker

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 1 Use
customer_reviews.text: This bidet stopped working after one use. All the lights on the unit still work but it will not start. I call the manufacture's service department number and only got an answering machine.
customer_reviews.author: Tod

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dry well but everything else is great.
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well and my wife really loves it. It took a while to get use to as this is my first bidet. Also, I think it does not dry very well.. It gets plenty hot, so hot that it will burn my rear-end if it’s in the higher settings! But it doesn’t have much force to blow the water off and is not aimed well. A friend of mine has a very expensive high end bidet and says his also does not dry very well, so this might be just a thing with bidets in general? Overall, this is a good device and I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: OC_

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: In light of today's TP-mageddon, where people hoard decades worth of butt paper, this gives me peace of mind. I know, regardless of the idiotic masses, my butt will be squeaky clean. Seriously though, easy to install (my 15-year-old did it), takes a little getting used to, but overall a clean anus all day. Not sure why there's a HIS butt cleaner versus a HER butt cleaner (aren't our asses in the same place?) but I've tried both and they work. I've tried the HER front cleaner, not bad if you're balls need a little TLC, but does require some drying. Speaking of the dryer, it's ok. I still want to dry a little with 2-3 squares of TP. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Bidet but you lose a seat
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good product and no operational or usage problems in 1.5 months of use. We have cut down on the amount of toilet paper used in that bathroom significantly. The remote controls are a little difficult to see when you are sitting and it is possible to hit the wrong button and get a surprise. Also, when you install the bidet, you effectively lose the toilet as a seat or to put your foot on top of it as there are many warnings not to do either.
customer_reviews.author: hmk

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of it and all the options. I just am a little peeved that the water jet is slightly off-centred left-to-right and hence cannot be recalibrated. Maybe only my bidet had this issue. I have to shift a little when it comes time to wash up. Don't bother with the dryer. It's not effective. Just use a few sheets of toilet paper to pat dry.
customer_reviews.author: Umesh Tgb

customer_reviews.title: Warm Tush = GI Joe Farts
customer_reviews.text: Sure this saves toilet paper and is good for the "environment", but the real reason to buy it is because it makes your tushy warm. The heated seat and warm dryer are great on a winter morning. However, there is a downside: the dryer produces a strong plasticizer aroma, which combined with a robust ass smell, produces a bouquet that can only be described as "GI Joe Farts", which is then blasted right at your face. Still totally worth it, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Cox

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe I've went so long without one!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome unit. I'm new to bidets . . . now I can't live without one! Easy install and believe me, I'm no plumber. Good directions, intuitive to learn the spray / dry functions. My one gripe is that I ordered the elongated model and it doesn't seem to be elongated at all. Highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: John Welpshire

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and great value
customer_reviews.text: After living in Europe we decided to upgrade our good thrones to the best ones;) This one is a gem: wont offend your buttercakes with cold and unpleasant seat: will stay warm and comfy for all your routines!! Keeps you fresh as a daisy and you can be paperless if you have time to dry it’s a perfect bidet at very affordable price. Fits USA elongated toilets and does impressive job with heating the water and just right pressure. Our maid uses mild cleaner dr bronners tea tree 18 in 1 soap to wash it since harsh cleaners aren’t recommended. Get it
customer_reviews.author: PolishPrincess88

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed it for the first 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this bidet. It did a good job of cleaning and drying. Installation was not as easy as expected. As others have stated, the T connection is tough to install without leaks. Once that problem was solved, it was fine. However, after just 3 month's use, it started leaking. I removed it and checked the position of the bidet on the toilet, since the manual stated if it was located to far to the rear of the bowl, the stream may land on the lip of the bowl and run down the side. This was not the case. After removing and replacing twice, the leak was still there, and I had to remove it permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Deter

customer_reviews.title: Super Clean and Warm
customer_reviews.text: Great concept that took a viral outbreak to embrace. I’m clean all the time, every time and TP use is cut by 85%. This is a short model that can be tougher for well endowed males. It works but have to elephant nose off the front occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: G in H-Town

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent bidet for the price. It has all the features you would expect from much more expensive models. The hot water last long enough to clean yourself and the heated seat is nice. The downside to this model is that the seat hole is very small and you have to adjust your Sitting position more then on other models I have used. Over all I like my Toto better but for the price this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: The seat arrived partially non-functioning. The wand would not ...
customer_reviews.text: The seat arrived partially non-functioning. The wand would not extend, staying in its housing. All other functions seem to work properly. I sent a message to the vendor stating the problem, but did not receive a reply after 3 days so I returned the defective unit. Overall, the unit seemed reasonably built for the price, but the lid is a little on the flimsy side. The overall size takes up quite a bit of room on a round style toilet, making an elongated toilet probably a bit more reasonable for fitment. I would give the unit itself 3 or 4 stars if it had been operational upon receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Durham

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use and Clean Results Sold Me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this seat because I was about to undergo left rotator cuff surgery and wanted to make toilet life simpler. I was not disappointed. I've never used a bidet but I'm sold on the cleanliness and decreased toilet paper use. This model also has a drying unit but it takes a while so I suggest you blot dry first for best results. Installation instructions were not complicated but I had my plumber install the unit because I wanted it in quickly and accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install in the USA as all of the hook ups are compatible
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item so we would stop using toilet paper. Usage of TP has been reduced. The blower is a nice add but it tends to push the odor into the bathroom, so i try to limit the use (of the blower). Adjustments to the air and water is a nice touch. I do not have an outlet close to the toilet, so i needed a small extension cord. I will need to install an outlet closer to the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Spud

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I needed to find a good bidet at a fair price, and this was one that caught our eyes. To be fair, it does not compare at all to the bidets that we would be able to get in Asia. Yet, for a bidet that is available here, it is a fair price and quality product and installation took 10 mins. Absolutely great. And after I train my cats to hit the buttons, I'll never need to worry about cleaning their water bowl again.
customer_reviews.author: ZombietheCat

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Still in the initial learning curve of using this. But so far, my whole family loves it! Does a great job of getting you clean. It has different cleaning positions and water pressures, which are a must have. Only reason I didn't give it a 5 star, is that the water splashes outside the toilet and into the floor while cleaning. It would a nice fix, to see the manufacturer install a small plastic lip onto the bottom of the bidet seat, which covers and extends past the actual toilet bowl... To keep the water from getting through the gap between seat and toilet bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: ... this seat several months ago and I am extremely satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat several months ago and I am extremely satisfied with this product. Well made and function as designed. Cleaning is easy and there are no issues on keeping it clean. Consumer should understand that the power cord is relative short so there is a need to have an outlet nearby to connect the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Torres

customer_reviews.title: I am  brand new to bidets, and  I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Its only been a few days, but for someone brand new to bidets I love it. Installation went smoothly, the you tube video is a good reference. One thing to check for is an outlet that is in, or near the bathroom so there's a place to plug it in. I had to get an extension cord for that. The heated seat, warm water, and super clean feeling after - all great.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: very inconsistent water temp and settings
customer_reviews.text: within 2 months of owning this, I was getting cold water (which is a shock), the nozzle seems to move about, and the toilet seat is sometimes warm sometimes not. on a few rare occasions, the water was scorching! I'm scared I have a defect (I hope for the sake of others mine is a defect and there isn't a lot of us with issues. :(
customer_reviews.author: Schmancy

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my husband after his spine surgery because he was unable to bend or twist and couldn’t wipe himself. This bidet was not only a lifesaver we don’t know how we ever lived without one. We love it and will never go back to life without one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bachman

customer_reviews.title: It works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time via USPS in good shape. package was also in great shape. I was able to install the Bidet in about and hour following instructions. I tested it, it was a learning process, when I got good at it. It proved to be easy to use. I love it!!!! Compared to my old methods, this is fantastic! I'm so clean when I'm done, check with toilet paper, CLEAN, no mess. Thanks Denny
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Carwash for your Arse
customer_reviews.text: I haven't left my bathroom since I installed this. It's a pretty amazing experience to sit on a warm toilet seat while warm water sprays your undercarriage. Forget buying all the toilet paper and storing it in your garage during the times of shortages, just get this and you'll never need toilet paper again... and you'll be cleaner than using toilet paper. How can you go wrong?
customer_reviews.author: Murphius

customer_reviews.title: Decent bidet that could be improved
customer_reviews.text: I used a Toto prior to this, but decided to try a different brand as the round Toto is no longer sold on Amazon. It's all around a good bidet; it has all the basic features one would need such as heated seat, heated water, position and pressure, and air dryer. My only complaint is the heated seat. The surface of the seat seems to have gaps where there is no heating element, so that when you sit, large areas will still feel very cold and there are only spots of warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: easy install
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want a bidet w/ remote. don't understand the practicality... it's not like you're watching TV. this is our 2nd purchase. had original model for over 11 yrs. warm seat/water in winter and cold water in summer is a great feature
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver after surgery
customer_reviews.text: Before having arthritic hand surgery on my dominant hand I had great concerns for completing hygiene care. I am a plus size woman and reaching behind with my Left hand was insufficient to say the least. I bought the Smart Bidet and it has been the answer I've needed!! I intend to buy more for my other bathrooms. The panel allows me to select the temperature levels of the seat and water to my own preferences. The strength of the spray is strong enough to appropriately cleanse all the areas adequately. Cleaning is easy as well! I wish I had bought this seat long ago because I won't go without one ever again!!
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied with product, not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It is not what I expected. It does not wash well, the water pressure is too weak. I do not recommend this item as it does not work the way I expected. Also, the toilet seat cover is rather bulky and the control panel is too far back and uncomfortable to reach buttons. I want to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: San F

customer_reviews.title: Warm and clean!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Seat warmer is awesome. Slow close for seat and lid is great. Water pressure seems to be variable even on a given setting (as in even if it’s just set to level 2 sometimes it feels stronger than other times) But the heating of the water is amazing The dryer function is not really useful... All in all, EXTREMELY satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not fully effective at cleaning the targeted areas. Dryer is useless. Couldn't get it to fit on the toilet base without some wobbling. Seat is a very poor fit to my Kohler toilet. Loose ~25% of the water surface exposure. White color mismatch. Top lid not solid enough to sit on. Looks very strange.
customer_reviews.author: mark a

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to like.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is nice with this product. It shipped a few days early so I was able to take advantage of a little extra time with it. I thought the installation of the feeder valve might be a problem but that ended well also. All said - we are continuing to do without TP and with a sly little smile at the end of the process.
customer_reviews.author: R David Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great features and price but needs to be more durable.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this bidet for 3 years now and have loved using it. At 2 1/2 years of use for a family of 6 the seat started to crack (users weight range from 50lbs to 220lbs) and shortly thereafter the seat heater stopped working and within a couple weeks the water stopped heating (it’s been a cold few months) This was our first bidet and can not live without it now. If the seat was more durable I would get another one but I am going to try an entry level Toto and hope it will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: william Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Truly life changing
customer_reviews.text: Ever function on the Smart bidet works very well. Be careful if you want to get one, my butt feels so dirty after pooping at a place without one now but that was not a problem before I used my bidet! Possible the best 260 bucks i ever spent
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Muzia

customer_reviews.title: This is worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I originally felt like a total idiot spending as much as I did on this. And then I used it. Now I feel like an idiot not buying one until now. This is the best thing I've ever purchased. You do run the risk of becoming spoiled and will feel like a peasant if you have to use a restroom outside of your home. I'll never go back.
customer_reviews.author: Asexual.flamingo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed and made item. Very effective in getting much cleaner than using paper. One caution - the phone number on the Amazon site that is supposed to contact the supplier comes up "invalid number." Go to the user manual if you need to contact.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Pippitt

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product.. I love it. Construction is solid and design is rich and beautiful. Have been using it for about a month and find it very useful. The control buttons' location is little inconvenient but you get used to. Want to install in each bathroom. In S. Korea it is very popular. Have not seen in any of the American or Canadian hotels, even 5 star ones, during my travel in last 30 years.
customer_reviews.author: Lyallpurwala

customer_reviews.title: DON'T RUSH WATER CONNECTIONS.
customer_reviews.text: Just a week into its use. Five star thus far. DELIVERY: Amazon. Hours ahead of promised. Picture on doorstep. PACKAGING: Well done. CONTENTS: Complete including options for different plumbing connections. INSTRUCTIONS: Easy to follow. Having been forewarned on water leaks, I was careful and used wrap on fittings. NO LEAKS. USE: So far everything I expected and then some. Impressed with electronics in such a small package. ADVERTISING: Should plainly show water connections on left and electrical on right. Mine were and greatly simplified installation.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: the seat size is too small and very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: A very nice addition to our new master bath. We have the elongated style. I am 5 foot 3 and weigh 156lb. I am not that large but my ischium bones sit right on the toilet seat and it is extremely painful for my ischium tendinitis condition. The standard size toilet seat which is also elongated does not cause a problem. Upon examining the specifications closely, low and behold the seat width on the Brondell S600 is narrower. Thanks for asking me to review tis product. Our builder had no problem installing.
customer_reviews.author: Hélène R. Houle

customer_reviews.title: I can't live without it now.
customer_reviews.text: I had one slight problem installing this bday on my Kohler toilet. It's one of the newer modern color and the plastic bolts that came with the bidet would not fit they were too big so I had to use the bolts that came with my Kohler toilet and that worked with a slight modification of two washers. Other than that, everything works fine and it's my first bidet and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Franchot Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had many fabulous top of the line Bidets of this style and this one is just as efficient and functional as those. I wanted to try a lower price model this time and I’m so glad I didn’t waste the money on a higher end model! Great product! Great price !
customer_reviews.author: The House Family

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t sure I would like this but it’s great.
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace fitting that attached to water inlet. Original to small. Other than that everything was straight foreword and simple. Including time to hardware store for new fitting I was done in less than two hours. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this product
customer_reviews.text: We have had one of these in use in our home for the better part of 5 years. This unit is very easy to install, no need for a plumber, or electrician. My wife can not imagine life with out one of these. We bought the latest one from Amazon, a little over two years ago. We are now ordering another one. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth b.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and get your backside clean
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Took me about 30 minutes to install. Its very straightforward. Has 3 settings for "His Backside" "Her Front side" and "Her Backside" which you can control and sets on its own. Dryer is ok. Wife likes the temperature of the warm water.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I have ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I had never had or used a bidet in my life but they sounded like a good idea. I could not be happier with my choice of this model and will never be without one again.
customer_reviews.author: James Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great seller. Absolutely a great product
customer_reviews.text: Rapid delivery, just as described. Great seller. Absolutely a great product. Works wonderfully, although the men's butt wash is rather pinpoint in direction and can be a little uncomfortable so hubby uses the lady sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: lynn m plummer

customer_reviews.title: Beats Toto overall
customer_reviews.text: Only negative is the control panel is to far back to have a good line of sight without twisting, should be farther forward.This unit has all the features of a seat costing a lot more and I don't see that much difference in quality. Certainly easier to install than a Toto unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tony J

customer_reviews.title: item should have reflected LOWER price - if I didn’t have to return it I would not have known!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product from Horton Solutions via Amazon.com. I paid over $370 for it and when one of the functions did not work it was suggested that I let them SEND it to me - which I refused. I returned product and at the time of the return it was reduced to $299! When I called to ask for something back they told me no. So I’m contacting Amazon and letting them know as well as buyers to beware!
customer_reviews.author: Ella J(281)

customer_reviews.title: Has all the features you need for a bidet
customer_reviews.text: Great bidet.. does everything higher priced models do.. adjust seat temp, spray intensity, nozzle length, water temp, even oscillates the spray! Easy to install.. could not ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: yobochef

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pre-COVID and it really came in handy. Works great, cleans well and is an easy unit to clean. The heater on the seat works great and so do the pressure settings. I recommend this bidet
customer_reviews.author: Mango 🥭 Mai

customer_reviews.title: The only toilet I ever want to use.
customer_reviews.text: best product I have ever purchased! the customer service from Hitron is also excellent. I love feeling fresh and clean. I also love not having a cold seat.
customer_reviews.author: George-Fan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my mother who is getting older and hard to get off the bathroom pot .
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Timely purchase in difficult times
customer_reviews.text: The single best purchase I’ve made in the last two years. It literally paid for itself in two months thanks to COVID-19. While everybody else is running to the grocery store for toilet paper I had it covered.
customer_reviews.author: Sotired

customer_reviews.title: Everything works except the adaptor for the valve. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything works except the adaptor for the valve. It has the 1/2 to 3/8 compression thread when the usual valve is 1/2" pipe thread. So, I had to purchase an adaptor for 1/2" pipet hread to 3/8 compression thread.
customer_reviews.author: Ferdinand Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: Everything good except the t-connector
customer_reviews.text: Overall my wife and I liked the bidet a lot. Installation was super easy except I had to rush to Home Depot to get the t-connector replaced. The one came with the bidet is cheap made and was causing leaking. After replaced with the Home Depot one, the bidet works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: yen

customer_reviews.title: No TP needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great bidet. In this COVID-19 era, a bidet was necessary. No TP needed at all. It is awesome. I even tried TP after to see how well it works. Squeaky clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Had for a year, still works great!
customer_reviews.text: The install was easy, water pressure is strong, still works like new a year later and was the best gift my husband has ever received (except for our dog). In his words "love means never having to wipe your own a**." Indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: ANOTHER GREAT PURCHASE FOR REMODELED BATHROOM
customer_reviews.text: JUST IN TIME FOR TOILET PAPER SHORTAGE. HAHAHA Never had a bidet but always wanted one, This does not have a remote control. Fabulous addition to any bathroom,,
customer_reviews.author: Gail S. Kregloe

customer_reviews.title: Only takes 5 minutes to install; if I can install it, you can.
customer_reviews.text: I returned form my first trip to Japan, and one of the things that I missed most was the bidet toilet seats. There is nothing better than that "clean all over" feeling.
customer_reviews.author: reluctant reviewer

customer_reviews.title: excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The Bidet SB2000 is an excellent product take we are very happy with. After approx. 11 months we experienced a problem with the nozzle not coming out to the requested setting. I called customer service and was put in the care of representative JUDY who sent parts within 2days and videos on replacing the parts. It was a piece of cake at no charge. 1yr. warranty. Thank you!! R. Patterson
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: The seat heats up nicely during winter to keep your tushy warm and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bidet seat for about 6 months now. It works just as well as when I first bought. The "sensor" that detects when you sit works well. The seat heats up nicely during winter to keep your tushy warm and the spray is is quite strong (which for some may be a downside). The spray also heats up to various temperatures which is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Milap

customer_reviews.title: very good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This bidet was an easy installation, lots of functions/settings, and very easy to use. We ordered this after traveling to Korea and seeing what great toilets and bidets they have there-- and so it is nice to have this one at home, too. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: a reader from Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone that visits our house wants to use the bathroom because of this bidet. This thing is a game changer. So much cleaner. Great for people with hemorrhoids, Crohn's, IBS. Great for a toilet paper shortage!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela White

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for father in law for after back surgery. He says it work great!!
customer_reviews.author: alisa wagner

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit. Pressure and volume way too low.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the elongated version. Wrong choice. Normal toilets you find in every house in North America are round.
customer_reviews.author: Margot

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Dryer is a gimmick, doesn't really dry. Wash functions are great and will save you on toilet paper, not to mention improve comfort after eating spicy foods.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Junk. (might have gotten a defective unit)
customer_reviews.text: Bought it yesterday, stopped working the next day after it would randomly shut off and turn back on constantly. Contacted customer support but never got a reply. -- update: 2/10 I finally got in contact with support and they sent a replacement unit, with a return label, and even tested it before it went out the door. Have had it hooked up for a few days now and it is not showing the same weird symptoms the first one did. I haven't completely gained trust yet in that it won't fail on me but it's much better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Oertel

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My toilet water pipe is connected to a PVC pipe, the t valve came with threads. Should've bought a Blondell bidet which connects directly to the water tank. After a trip to Lowe's, the bidet is up and running, so far so good, a little wobbly though
customer_reviews.author: OzzieJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to install. I love it already! It's nice to have a bidet with warm water and a heated seat. The dryer isnt very strong but it definitely cuts down on TP usage.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia24

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PROCUCT AND GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: The SmartBidet SB-2000 is quiet featured packeted, easy to install, and well designed. I bought 3 of them in 2017 and I love it! It keeps rear end clean and less use of toilet paper and now we are having a shortage of toilet paper because people got panic over COVID-19. I am glad that I bought this product and I am highly recommended to you. I travel to European and Asian countries and try them there, I bring back that experience, and want to use them at home. Tasnee
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I bought two Smartbidet sb-2000. The one is okay, but the other was defective item. The nozzle was leaking from the first use. I think Smartbidet is not under quality control so their products are unreliable and unstable. I bought Brondell at Lowes and quite satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Took us years to decide to commit to buying one of these. Now we wish we had purchased it years ago! This is AWESOME for more reasons than I can explain... Health and cleanliness are easy with this bidet.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Carson & Bruce Lominac

customer_reviews.title: Heating
customer_reviews.text: We've been using ours for about 6 months now. I really love it, but do have some issues with the water heating. It is very inconsistent. Without touching the controls between uses sometimes it's lukewarm, sometimes very warm, and sometimes cool. It doesn't keep me from using it, but it's always a surprise as to what we'll get. It also doesn't remember settings (position, strength), between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Before you think something is wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. After initial installation I was concerned because of a constant drip as if it was leaking internally. As soon as I googled it I saw a YouTube from the manufacturer showing the possible cause which was the mount put the seat too close to the tank preventing it from locking in properly. Sure enough a simple adjustment fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: very nice and efficient unit.
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a gift for my daughters house. She loves it. this unit is well made and very effective. it does everything it advertises. it is self cleaning and has adjustable settings. i have one in my home also.
customer_reviews.author: Seaellie

customer_reviews.title: Included 1/2" to 3/8" adapter did not fit.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great value. I did have difficulties upon install. Apparently the adapter they included is a 1/2" compression type female adapter and it didn't fit my 1/2" valve. I did go to the hardware store and found an adapter by BrassCraft. It's called Speedi Adaptor, Water Supply Valve. Adapts 1/2" OD Slip Joint to 3/8" OD Connector. The SKU # is: 026613158129
customer_reviews.author: R. Fong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you didn't stock up on toilet paper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bidet for my husband's Christmas present. It works great. You still have to pat dry after the dryer is done but the water cleans great. Perfect if you didn't stock up on toilet paper! Comfortable warm seat, adjustable temp in water and dryer. Adjustable pressure and position.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: RUDE INSTALLER OF BEDET
customer_reviews.text: The service man to install the Best was very rude; when I asked what he is planning to do, he kept saying: " You are not listening to me" etc etc. In the middle, he just left without installing the Bedet.
customer_reviews.author: giri ramanathan

customer_reviews.title: Comments
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit we have owned. The seat and seat cover when closing do not operate as smoothly as our first unit.
customer_reviews.author: john e hatch

product_meta.title: SmartBidet SB-2000 Electric Bidet Seat for Round Toilets - Electronic Heated Toilet Seat with Warm Air Dryer and Temperature Controlled Wash Functions (White)
product_meta.description: Size:RoundSmartBidet is easy to install and offers its users hygiene, comfort, and convenience. It is easy to use and friendly to the environment. SmartBidet also offers a stylish design and a multi-function control panel. Here are a few of SmartBidet's amazing features: Posterior wash, feminine wash, oscillating wash, warm air dryer, adjustable water pressure, hygienic filtered water, heated water, heated seat, safety on/off sensor, self-cleaning nozzle, quick release seat for easy cleaning, energy saving mode, soft close lid and seat.
feature_bullets: Multi-wash functions with self-cleaning nozzle & oscillation: for her front, her back, his back
Adjustable water pressure (5 levels), water temperature (3 levels) & nozzle positions (5 levels)
Heated seat (3 levels) with safety on/off skin sensor which activates bidet only when seated
Warm air dryer, adjustable to 5 levels, which eliminates the need for toilet paper
Energy saving mode, soft closing lid and seat, easy to install

specifications.Style: Round Toilets, Electronic Heated Toilet Seat with Warm Air Dryer
specifications.Included Components: Plumbing Fixtures, Toilet Seats and Bidet Seats, bidet-seats
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars535 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
